summary: Guess what you didn't notice in Dragonsreach. You missed a bandit and guess what he's carrying? It is something cool that's for sure.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod adds a bandit to Dragonsreach. What's so different for this bandit is that this one is carrying a high quality Dawnbreaker!
You can find that bandit at top floor, he's just sitting.

[/size]THIS IS A RETEXTURE OF THE SWORD, I PUT IT IN A BANDIT FOR BONUS!
[/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[/font][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatically with manager or you know what to do.
[/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][/size][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/zY9gM2T.jpg[/img][/size][/font]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
[size=3][img]http://i.imgur.com/q9baQ9s.jpg[/img][/size]

[url=http://i.imgur.com/mvTAiiN.jpg][size=4]C[/size][/url][/font][size=4][url=http://i.imgur.com/mvTAiiN.jpg]omparison Images[/url][/size][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3][/size][/font][/center]
author: ProtologolusX
